text:
The Leoben District is a district in the state of Styria in Austria. It has an area of 1,052 km². As of 1 January 2019, 60,060 people lived there. The administrative center of the district is Leoben.
Municipalities.
Towns are indicated in boldface; market towns in "italics"; suburbs, hamlets and other subdivisions of a municipality are indicated in small characters.
